nodes.text: A Simple Home was communal housing used by the Followers of the Cosmic Balance. They were the residences of the ascetics, those siblings who had been given the Bowl and committed to a life of servitude. While their sibling prospered in this life, the ascetics expected to reap the rewards in the afterlife, known as the "Life To Come."

Simple Homes were overseeing by the Zanazi with the help of Home Mothers and Home Fathers. Male and female ascetics were house separately, and Simple Homes depended on contributions from the Followers of the Cosmic Balance.
